public static class BaseExtensionRestHandler.DeprecatedRouteHandler extends org.opensearch.rest.RestHandler.DeprecatedRoute

      Handle the method and path with the specified handler.
      Parameters:
      method - The RestRequest.Method to handle.
      path - The path to handle.
      deprecationMessage - The message to log with the deprecation logger
